Text.Page:
Hey, there! I got "voluntold" and I need your help. The Mysterium has demanded I thin out the kumas ranks around here.

Have you seen the kumases? They're huge, mean, and bloodthirstyâ€”and those are their good qualities.

Look, I can't do it. I'm a lone warrior, but if you gathered some allies, I bet you could take them down. Kill an {@LinkCreature:7#3#indolent kumas} and I'll give you the reward. Deal?
Great job. As promised, here's the reward. I hope you don't mind but I had to take credit so you could get this. I doubt they'll ask for something this big anytime soon.
